home.title: Help
home.description: Amazon Bedrock offers access to a diverse range of large language models. This demo showcases how foundation models can be accessed through a single Bedrock API to serve multiple usecases

doc-chat.title: Document Chat
doc-chat.description: Store your documents on Amazon Opensearch serverless service and query those documents in natural language. Supports multiple languages and multiple FMs on Amazon Bedrock

doc-chat-manage.title: Manage Documents
doc-chat-manage.description: Upload PDF files, that are then vectorized and stored in Amazon Opensearch serverless service(AOSS). AOSS supports semantic searches which is a key requirement when building a Retrieval Augmented Generation based solution

sentiment.title: Sentiment Analysis
sentiment.description: Identify the sentiment of customer reviews/tweets/posts etc...

multi-agent.title: Multi Agent
multi-agent.description: Here we have multiple GenAI agents working together to solve a user problem. You could use agents to generate presentations/search the web/build applications, games and much more. All of this in a few seconds without writing any code

ocr.title: OCR
ocr.description: Extract text from images or PDFs all through foundation models on Amazon Bedrock
